text: The Taylor J-2 Cub (later also known as the Piper J-2 Cub) is an American light aircraft that was designed and built by the Taylor Aircraft Company. The company became the Piper Aircraft Company and the J-2 was first of a long line of related Piper Cub designs. Its engine is a Continental A-40-3. == Variants == * Dudek V-1 Sportplane. Home Made. Category:American aircraft
title: Taylor J-2 Cub
